Central Bank of Mauritania (French: Banque centrale de Mauritanie, BCM; Arabic: ) bụ etiti  nke Mauritania, n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka.Ụlọ akụ ahụ dị n'isi obodo Nouakchott, dị na ndịda nke obí onyeisi oche.  Onye na-achị ya ugbu a bụ Cheikh El Kebir Moulay Taher.

E guzobere ụlọ akụ ahụ site na iwu nke ndị omeiwu nke Mauritania, na 1973, 1974 na 1975. Onye isi ala Moktar Ould Daddah hiwere ya mgbe ọ wepụrụ Mauritania na ngalaba ego ndị France na-achị, Communauté Financière Africaine..
